name: Karan Balkar
desc: Karan Balkar is a mobile application developer primarily working on Android for the past 5 years. He has also worked on Augmented reality / Virtual reality based mobile applications and is passionate about exploring innovative technologies. He also writes a blog named, Threads of Life.

name: Umang Kalra
desc: Now Iâ€™d like to welcome Umang Kalra. He is a graduate from IIIT Pune, and the founder, CEO of Octaflyte. Apart from being a Microsoft Imagine Cup '22 National pre-finalist, he also works towards developing scalable GIS applications. He has also worked with Godot Engine for GSoC '21.

name: Sandeep Singh
desc: Sandeep Singh is an Open Source enthusiast who writes code out of the profession and loves to engage in tech communities out of passion. He is also an events manager at Koii and was previously part of various communities like Commudle, CodeAsylums, Merge Intern.

name: Kartik Ohri
desc: Kartik Ohri is a software developer and ListenBrainz lead. He has experience of participating in the Open Source community since 2017. He is also a graduate from Jawaharlal Nehru University. Kartik also has the experience of mentoring students during GSoC.
